title: Jerry Stackhouse Joins the Show!
description:
The Pistons unveil their throwback teal jerseys. Jerry Stackhouse joins the show to talk the retro looks and what he expects for the Pistons this season. He also talks coaching Vanderbilt during the NIL era and the challenges he faces. Also, Kyrie Irving still stuck in Brooklyn. Why the guys think it’s best for this Nets team to come together and run it back. And, is it better to be loyal or make money? The guys debate whether Damian Lillard will rot in Portland or look to compete next season. Plus, a homework clause in Kyler Murray’s new deal? We need to break this one down. All that and more!

itunes:author: ESPN, Jalen Rose, David Jacoby
